testcase.classname: user should be able to register to the system
testcase.name: user register with valid info
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to registration page..................................passed When user enters all data successfully and submits..........................passed Then success registration message should be displayed to the user...........passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enter valid username and password And user click on login button..passed Then user could login successfully and go to homepage.......................passed And End browser.............................................................passed

testcase.name: user reset password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to home page...........................................passed When user click on forgot link and enters correct email.....................passed Then user should receive email with instructions............................passed And Close...................................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to search
testcase.name: user search
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to home page...........................................passed When user type in the search field..........................................passed Then results should be displayed based on the search criteria...............passed And End.....................................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to change currency
testcase.name: user changes currency
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to home page to change currency........................passed When user changes current currency..........................................passed Then currency should be changed.............................................passed And End currency............................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to choose category
testcase.name: user selects category
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to home page to select category........................passed When user selects category..................................................passed Then category should be displayed...........................................passed And End categories..........................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to choose color
testcase.name: user selects color
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to home page to select color...........................passed When user selects color.....................................................passed Then results should be filtered with the selected color.....................passed And End colors..............................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to choose tags
testcase.name: user selects tags
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to home page to select tags............................passed When user selects tag.......................................................passed Then results should be filtered with the selected tag.......................passed And End tags................................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to add to cart

testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to home page to add to cart............................passed When user adds an item to the cart..........................................passed Then item should be added to the cart.......................................passed And End cart................................................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to home page to add to wishlist........................passed When user adds an item to the wishlist......................................passed Then item should be added to the wishlist...................................passed And End wishlist............................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to add item to wishlist
testcase.name: user compares between items
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to home page to compare between items..................passed When user adds items to compare.............................................passed Then item should be added to the compare....................................passed And End compare.............................................................passed

testcase.name: user place an order successfully
